thread.title: Letter: Yonkers needs Meyer on City Council
thread.title_full: Letter: Yonkers needs Meyer on City Council

title: Letter: Yonkers needs Meyer on City Council
text:
Letter: Yonkers needs Meyer on City Council The Journal News 11:10 a.m. EDT October 26, 2015 Buy Photo The clock tower at Yonkers City Hall. (Photo: Mark Vergari/The Journal News) Buy Photo 1 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
I strongly support Michael Meyer, Republican, Conservative and Independence Party Candidate for Yonkers City Council in the 3rd District. 
We need someone who truly cares about the residents of the 3rd Council District and that candidate is Michael Meyer with his Community First attitude and along with his platform of getting back to the basics, also his main issue of our quality of life in our district totally galvanizes me and I strongly ask all 3rd District residents on Election Day, when they go to the polls, to vote for Michael Meyer for Yonkers City Council in the 3rd DIstrict. 
I strongly feel that we need to return back to the days when we had a representative who we could all respect, and those days were when we were represented by former Councilwoman Joan Gronowski. 
I strongly feel that a Meyer Victory will bring us back to those days. 
In my opinion, the current City Councilman is a rubber stamp for Mayor Spano and that Michael Sabatino only cares about photo ops and ribbon cuttings and has been a failure as councilman in my view. 
Sabatino is also supported by the special interests and political insiders that have long ruined our city. It's time to get back to the basics and elect Michael Meyer to the Yonkers City Council on Election Day, Tuesday, Nov. 3. 
Delfim A. Heusler 1 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://lohud.us/1N2rfDI TOP VIDEOS
